channel.title: ***[How to add an Event to a custom item?]***
channel.description:
So I want to add an Event to a custom item, much like the once popular, "Bunny Ears Morph" where you put them on and you morph into a bunny.
What im searching for is a code for my custom wings to fly, like ::god. I don't remember how to do this AT ALL. And to return to normal when taken off. So please help me?
♥Mod Val♥

item.title: ***[How to add an Event to a custom item?]***
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Here then.
Search this in your client class.

public boolean wear

Then like, add this under where you think is appropriate.

if (wearID == 6070) {
            setAnimation(1500);
            playerSE = 1501;
            playerSEW = 1851;
            playerSER = 1851;
            playerSEA = 1851;
            playerEnergy = 99999999;
            sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149);
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Might work, might not.

Read full topic
item.source: ***[How to add an Event to a custom item?]***

item.title: ***[How to add an Event to a custom item?]***
item.dc:creator: @h4x0r88 h4x0r88
item.description:
@h4x0r88 wrote:

[quote=“Mod Val, post:3, topic:303776”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=400060.msg2966953#msg2966953 date=1253660003]
Server side, if you have the ‘bunny ears’ morph in your server, then I would suggest searching the ID of the bunny ears in your client class, and then taking a look at the code that comes with it.
[/quote]

That’s the thing, I don’t have the morph.[/quote]I remember that!
When you equip the item, the server tells your client that your now a npc.

Read full topic
item.source: ***[How to add an Event to a custom item?]***
